name: Easy From Aragog to Zabini Trivia Quiz | For Children | 10 Questions

questions.text: What do Draco Malfoy, Horace Slughorn, Severus Snape, and Blaise Zabini have in common?
questions.explanation:
All are Slytherins.

	Draco and Blaise are Slytherin students. Snape is Head of Slytherin House, a position that Slughorn formerly held. When Snape kills Dumbledore and flees, Slughorn takes over as Slytherin head.

questions.text: What do Aunt Petunia Dursley, Mr. and Mrs. Granger, and Tom Riddle Senior have in common?
questions.correct: All are Muggles who are closely related to wizards or witches
options: They all have daughters who are witches
All have nieces or nephews who are wizards or witches
They all hate the wizarding community
questions.explanation:
All are Muggles who are closely related to wizards or witches.

	Aunt Petunia had a sister (Lily Potter) who was a witch, and she has a nephew (Harry) who is a wizard. Mr. and Mrs. Granger have a daughter, Hermione, who's a witch. Tom Riddle Senior is Voldemort's dad.

questions.text: What do Albus Dumbledore, Rufus Scrimgeour, and Lord Voldemort have in common?
options: All have died by the end of Book 6
questions.explanation:
All are leaders.

	Dumbledore is of course headmaster at Hogwarts, Scrimgeour is Minister of Magic, and Voldemort leads the Death Eaters.

questions.text: What do Marvolo, Merope, and Morfin have in common?
questions.explanation:
All are Gaunts.

	Marvolo is Voldemort's grandfather, Merope is his mother, and Morfin is his uncle. The Gaunts are pureblood descendants of the first Slytherin.

questions.text: What do Riddle's diary, Hufflepuff's golden cup, and Slytherin's locket have in common?
questions.explanation:
All are probably Voldemort's Horcruxes.

	A Horcrux is part of a wizard or witch's soul. Horcruxes that reside in objects such as Slytherin's locket can only be created by killing someone. Counting the part of his soul that is still in his body, Voldemort originally had seven Horcruxes (but he has killed far more people than that).

questions.text: What do Bill, Charlie, Fred, George, Ginny, Percy, and Ron have in common?
questions.correct: All are Molly and Arthur Weasley's children
options: All played on Gryffindor's Quidditch team
questions.explanation:
All are Molly and Arthur Weasley's children.

	Bill, Charlie, Percy, and the twins once attended Hogwarts, and Ron and Ginny still do. Percy never played Quidditch for Gryffindor. He is the Weasley black sheep because he favors the Ministry of Magic over everything else, including his family. Bill, perhaps the handsomest Weasley, is disfigured by a werewolf in Book 6. He is to wed Fleur Delacour in Book 7.

questions.text: What do Aragog, Buckbeak, and Fang have in common?
questions.correct: All are creatures beloved by Hagrid
options: All live in the Forbidden Forest
All are creatures beloved by Voldemort
questions.explanation:
All are creatures beloved by Hagrid.

	Fang is Hagrid's huge dog. Hagrid saves Fang from a fire at the end of Book 6. Aragog, a gigantic hairy spider whom Hagrid raised from an egg, dies in Book 6 and receives a solemn funeral attended by Hagrid, Harry, and Professor Slughorn. Buckbeak (alias Witherwings) is a hippogriff that once lived with Sirius Black. Buckbeak returns to live with Hagrid after Sirius's death. The hippogriff saves Harry from Snape's wrath.

questions.text: What do Neville Longbottom, Cormac McLaggen, Dean Thomas, and Ginny Weasley have in common?
options: All are Gryffindor Quidditch team members
All are dear friends of Harry Potter's
All are members of Dumbledore's Army
questions.explanation:
All are Gryffindor students.

	All but Neville play for the Gryffindor Quidditch team in Book 6. Harry dislikes Cormac and feels jealous of Dean's relationship with Ginny.

questions.text: What do the Weasley twins have in common with Mr. Borgin of Borgin and Burkes?
options: All work at the Ministry of Magic
questions.explanation:
All are shopkeepers.

	Fred and George have a joke shop called Weasley's Wizarding Wheezes. Borgin has a sinister shop in Knockturn Alley. Borgin sells items used in the Dark Arts.

questions.text: What do Sirius Black, James and Lily Potter have in common?
questions.correct: All died at the hands of Voldemort or his Death Eaters
options: All are blood relations of Harry Potter
All are pureblood wizards and witches
Death Eater Severus Snape killed all of them
questions.explanation:
All died at the hands of Voldemort or his Death Eaters.

	Voldemort killed James and Lily, and Bellatrix Lestrange killed Sirius. On a happier note, thanks for taking my 200th quiz!
